about_the_game:
In the Demo version of ZhuiShu, you'll step into the intertwined lives of two individuals, Jiang Yufei and Yang Fan, as they begin their journey into a web of mystery and suspense.

  • Jiang Yufei: A teacher whose ordinary life takes a dark turn after the mysterious death of a student. Her quiet routine is disrupted as she stumbles upon a seemingly insignificant clue that drags her deeper into a harrowing secret.

  • Yang Fan: A detective drawn into the mystery by a cryptic radio signal received late at night. The Demo introduces the beginning of his investigation, as he uncovers eerie traces of an unseen force guiding events.

Both characters are on the brink of uncovering buried truths, and in this Demo, you will experience the first steps of their fateful journey.

Gameplay

  • The Demo of ZhuiShu offers a glimpse into the core mechanics of this classic point-and-click adventure. Players will explore detailed environments, collect items, and solve puzzles that gradually reveal the story’s secrets.

Core Features

  • Character Switching: Alternate between Jiang Yufei and Yang Fan as their stories begin to unfold.

  • Rich Storytelling: Experience the opening chapters of a narrative blending suspense, horror, and emotional depth.

  • Puzzle Mechanics: Engage with an array of early puzzles that lay the foundation for a deeper mystery.

  • Unique Atmosphere: Explore environments that capture the tension and cultural depth central to the game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence, blood, suicide

short_description: Can you hear it? The faint sound coming from an abandoned radio, calling out for forgotten children. Trace back a chilling tale lost to time and unravel the mysteries hidden within the ruins. Who is silently watching you? And who lurks within the fog, waiting for answers?
